Title: Beaded Evening Dress with Lace Skirt

----

Sku: C1017

Category: evening

Featured-image: 

----

Description: This dress is ready for any evening special occasion. Its floor length, pleated lace skirt overlay a colored long skirt that adds a hint of mystery to this gown. The back has a panel of color and a sheer neckline. The bead and jewels design comes to a high neck line but with a peek-a-boo cut out on the chest.
